title: Shakespeare's Globe Theatre On Screen Henry IV Part Two (2012)
description:
Shakespeare's Globe Theatre On Screen Henry IV Part Two (2012)

Runtime 171 minutes in two files (Act break)	


Directed for the stage by Dominic Fromgoole
Directed for the screen by Ross MacGibbon

Cast:

 Roger Allam (Sir John Falstaff)
 Oliver Cotton (King Henry the Fourth)
 Jamie Parker (Prince Hal),
 Barbara Marten (Mistress Quickly / Lady Northumberland)
   and many of the cast from Part One including
   Jade Williams Doll Tearsheet
   Paul Rider  (Bardolph/Archbishop of York)

Summary:

  Part 2 includes some of the greatest moments in Shakespeare: the deathbed scene of the old King, when Hal contemplates the crown; and Hal's devastating rejection of Falstaff himself.

My notes:

     The torrent is best viewed in Media Player Classic Home Cinema.  In the torrents that say LEV in the file name, these have been enhanced for voice using the freeware audio program called The Levelator.  Leveling the audio makes the torrents more friendly to those who would view at night without having to adjust volume.  Media Player Classic Home Cinema player has few if any audio adjustments which would interfere with these enhancements.

Notes written August 17th, 2013
